reasoningText.text:
The user wants me to migrate a Java project from Java 8 to Java 17. The repository is located at `/tmp/workdir/baseline_strands_min_20260129/buycycle`.

My approach will be:
1. First, explore the repository structure to understand what we're working with
2. Look at the pom.xml or build.gradle to see the current Java version configuration
3. Update the build configuration to use Java 17
4. Run `mvn clean verify` to identify any issues
5. Fix any compilation or runtime issues that arise
6. Keep iterating until `mvn clean verify` passes
